0011100111100010 0101111000001001 1 -> sum: 1001011111101100, cout: 0
0011111100100111 0100010110000011 1 -> sum: 1000010010101011, cout: 0
1010011011100000 0001000010000011 0 -> sum: 1011011101100011, cout: 0
1010001001010101 0111110110010100 0 -> sum: 0001111111101001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
